title: Doran's shield should block more from ranged spells/basic attacks
body: The item is pretty underwhelming right now as is, this change at least makes it viable in some situations as opposed to none

replies.body: Just drop the price to 400g...1 more pot during laning would make the difference.

Doran's shield was my favorite starting item when it granted 10hp5, before the support items came out.  I wish I could justify buying it today aside from the very rare top lane match-ups; usually it's better to just take the flask.
I mean there are plenty of items that can or cant work for ranged. or do less perks for ranged. Why not items for def work the same way

There's a reason why it was nerfed and it needs to stay that way until the original problem is taken care of. It was being taken on meele supports instead of a gold item for great earlygame 2v2 power. It was basically a nuke. Nobody wanted to take it but if the enemy had it you needed it too or you'd get rolled early.
Also with the camp-back-tp shennanigans we have going on in toplane right now a Dshield+5pots+1 manapot start would be a bit too strong as most ranged champions can't clear a camp at lvl 1.

That make's no sense whatsoever,why not just make it block more in general,is it gonna oppress melees or something?
If you want to buff an item,suggest one that makes sense.
you forget that it also gives you 6 HP regen, which is prretty op in lane especially on stuff like {{champion:8}}

Time for a dota refference to show that this item can be buffed

Stout Shield
Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Proc Chance: 50%
Blocked Damage (melee): 16
Blocked Damage (ranged): 8

Poor Man's Shield
Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.
Hero Proc Chance: 100%
Non-Hero Proc Chance: 53%
Blocked Damage (melee): 20
Blocked Damage (ranged): 10

So yes it could easily be balanced and would make a 1 v 2 lane easier to deal with as well as ranged champs who make it hell for non mobile melee.
They could give more counterplay to ranged champions instead, but seeing as the majority of ranged top laners are there because they lack any, well, nah we gotta think of the Supports!
